name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Opposite is also true though, depending on the stage of the moba game where you need teammates or not (if you've snowballed with a carry / core hero, some players will argue that you don't need your friends... as much other than for spell absorption).    Morale is still a big factor, and while a solid leader can keep people in line and in the game, an unled team with one fatalist or doomsayer can easily ruin any chances as well.
